reporting-org.narrative: Makerere University School of Public Health

title.narrative: Reducing High Fertility Rates and Improving Sexual Reproductive Health outcomes in Uganda (RISE)

description.narrative: As part of the RISE project, MakSPH is responsible for analysing the level of service of provision for FP in Uganda, conducting resource mapping for FP services, market segmentation and willingness to pay for FP services

participating-org.narrative: Makerere University School of Public Health
